resources.mymap_description: This map shows all the data from active groups in your account
resources.group_access_description: Private may be a group which has at least 8 devices. Privacy lies in the fact that through the site will not be able to find a group, and it will not be able to see the users did not take place in the group.
resources.group_rules_warn: Please carefully read the rules of creating groups:
resources.group_rules_1: The group name should be descriptive (recommended English)
resources.group_rules_2: If the name is an acronym or a group such as the name of the organization please complete description so that you can understand who and what created the group
resources.group_rules_3: Be sure to fill out the contact email group, it we can send the verification email. Keep this address is always relevant, in the case of not receiving a response to our request to this email, the group may be blocked.
resources.group_rules_4: We do not approve of round the clock monitoring stationary most of the time, objects in groups
